title: Bright & spacious 3BR, 2BA flat with updated amenities avail. 8/16
posting_body: ['Bright and spacious Central Sunset flat available mid August with lots of charming details:', '- Open layout living room, dining room/eating area, and kitchen with grand floor to ceiling windows inviting tons of natural light', '- New kitchen appliances (dishwasher and dual door refrigerator/freezer - not updated in the photos)', '- New closets throughout all 3 bedrooms and hallway closet to fully utilize all storage space', '- Master bedroom includes private bath suite, renovated walk-in closet, and a window nook that is perfect for a vanity space or cozy reading corner', '- Updated flooring and light fixtures throughout', '- Separate laundry room in-unit with new washer and dryer', '- Central heat', '- Parking space with storage area in garage (space is unobstructed - not tandem; garage is shared with 2 other units)', '- Shared backyard', '- Approx.', '1333 SF', 'Conveniently located:', '- 1/2 a block to Golden Gate Park', '- Easy access to UCSF Parnassus medical', '- 1 block to 7, 7X, 7R buses', '- 3 blocks to N-Judah, NX (last stop direct to downtown), and tech shuttles', '- Minutes to trendy Inner Sunset 9th/Irving shops and restaurants; local farmers market every weekend!', 'Lease Details:', '- Min. 12 month lease', '- Deposit: $6,500', '- Tenant responsible for PG&E, hot water, and internet', '- No smoking and no pets', '- Parking included', '- Available 8/16']
